Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue, just south of the Shrine of Life and Death.
Room.LongDescription: Oceancrest Avenue runs west into the Harvest Circle and continues to the east through the eastern half of the city. On the north is the Clerical Shrine of Life and Death, the shrine which examines the complex, philosophical questions of life and death, integral to every form of religion.
